channel.title: Harrow, Alix E. on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Harrow, Alix E. on Chege's Blog

item.title: The Sandman
item.description: The Sandman (1989 - 1996) by Neil Gaiman. Image from Sandman #36. Path to comic: Lucifer (Netflix) -> Lucifer (Comic) -> The Sandman (Comic) Netflix is also adapting the comic, so interested in how it deviates from the source. Ser Brienne of Tarth will be Lucifer. Hype! Love Dream: Sister – you know how I felt for Nada one. What I feel for her still.
